name: Bloobo Versus Evil Covid
description:
I made this game so you would stay inside and play it.

You play as Bloobo a white blood cell from Rambo, defending a person against evil waves of corona virus.

Essentially it's a twin stick shooter where you defend a nose on a big human face.  Horde of enemies tries to reach the nose which you defend.

Game made in 48 hours. I'm preparing a making-of video.

Youtube: DevDennis
Twitter: DevDennisJ
Instagram: DevDennisJ
